title: Kona Grill offers sushi and margaritas at American grill restaurants
statement: Kona Grill is described as a classic American grill that features sushi and margaritas alongside traditional grill items like steaks and seafood.

citations.quote: Kona Grill is a classic American grill featuring an array of delicious menu items including hearty steaks and fresh seafood complemented by the best choice of sushi and margaritas
